sections.heading: CONSTRUCTING BUILDINGS ACCORDING TOPLOTS, AND OTHER WORKS BY THE JOB, ANDOF FURNISHING MATERIALSArt
sections.text: 2756. Building by plot and work by job, definitions.To build by a plot, or to work by the job, is to undertake a building or a work for a certain stipulated price.
